dockerInstall.description: Set if docker have to be installed on the machine

endpointType.description: Rackspace endpoint type (adminURL, internalURL or the default publicURL)

flavorId.description: Rackspace flavor ID. Default: General Purpose 1GB

imageId.description: Rackspace image ID. Default: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (Trusty Tahr) (PVHVM)

sshPort.description: SSH port for the newly booted machine. Set to 22 by default

sshUser.description: SSH user for the newly booted machine. Set to root by default
